choose.when: merge into appmon_event_count_last a using ( select #{domain} as domain, #{instance} as instance, #{event} as event, #{ymd} as ymd, #{hh} as hh, #{mm} as mm, #{total} as total, #{delta} as delta from dual ) b on (a.domain = b.domain and a.instance = b.instance and a.event = b.event) when matched then update set ymd = b.ymd, hh = b.hh, mm = b.mm, total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.domain, b.instance, b.event, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
choose.otherwise: merge into appmon_event_count_last as a using values (#{domain}, #{instance}, #{event}, #{ymd}, #{hh}, #{mm}, #{total}, #{delta}) as b (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) on (a.domain = b.domain and a.instance = b.instance and a.event = b.event) when matched then update set ymd = b.ymd, hh = b.hh, mm = b.mm, total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.domain, b.instance, b.event, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
